text: Boasa tung ro ahu, hape ndang adong manang ise hudapot? Joujou ahu, hape ndang adong na mangalusi? Tung na majempekku do huroha tanganku mambahen haluaon? Manang tung na so margogo ahu huroha paluahon? Ida ma, marhitehite pangasupingku huarsik do laut, hubahen do angka batang aek gabe halongonan, gabe bau do angka dengke di bagasan, sian na soada aek, jala marmatean dibahen uas.
